attributes.action: Ensure that all Americans have their finger prints taken when entering the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Americans treat citizens of their prized partner, UK, as common criminals by taking their finger prints when they enter the USA. Taking finger prints is akin to be being accused of a crime for many UK citizens. So, why does the UK not gain an opt out for its citizens? Failing this, it is only correct that the UK takes finger prints of Americans.
The argument of security is non-sense when there are millions of illegal immigrants in USA and the US does nothing about them, because they want cheap labour. Surely, this is also a security issue.
